ai_description: A pair of black hexagonal 5 kg KAKSS dumbbells with white weight and logo markings on the ends. The neoprene-coated surface appears matte and textured for a non-slip grip. Shown on gym floors, benches, and carpets, they look compact, sturdy, and suited for home or gym use.
target_audience: Home fitness users, gym-goers, and individuals at any fitness level seeking 5 kg dumbbells for strength and conditioning.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Sets for Gym Exercise (5kg pack of 2, Black)
